mapper.sql: id, agencyid, username, truename, password, tel, email, act, valid, createddate, islock, errorcount, errortime, brand, isactived,activetime,conditions,claimpro,isapproval
mapper.select:
select
from usermember where 1=1
and ( truename like "%"#{truename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or username like "%"#{truename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" )
and tel like "%"#{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and act like "%"#{act,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and aegncyid=#{aegncyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and valid=0
and valid=1
and isactived=0
and isactived=1
mapper.insert: insert into usermember (id, agencyid, username, truename, password, tel, email, act, valid, createddate, islock, errorcount, errortime, brand, isactived,activetime,conditions,claimpro,isapproval ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agencyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{truename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{act,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{islock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{errorcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{errortime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isactived,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{conditions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{claimpro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{isapproval,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update usermember
agencyid = #{agencyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
truename = #{truename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
act = #{act,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valid = #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createddate = #{createddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

isactived = #{isactived,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activetime = #{activetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
conditions = #{conditions,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update usermember set agencyid = #{agencyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, truename = #{truename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, act = #{act,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid = #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createddate = #{createddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, islock = #{islock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, errorcount = #{errorcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, errortime = #{errortime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isactived = #{isactived,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activetime = #{activetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, conditions = #{conditions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, claimpro = #{claimpro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isapproval = #{isapproval,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
